entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
